trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Milanville
There were no other sightings in Milanville on or around January 4th 2012
divs: Sighting DetailsAround 830pm as I was leaving the barn and walking ot my house I felt as I was being watched so i turned around and looked up and saw lights blinking ,I went and got my Binoculars and I saw a larg disk shaped craft with glowing green aturn on the surface and at the outer edge of th craft was red ,blue ,green, white light blinking in verryed pattern ,I then went and got my camera and took a few shots and then shot a few short vids of it and it backed away south south est out of range of my cam so I went in asn got my teloscope and set it up and it was to bright in the teloscope to make out any thing but the lights , I then went in the house it was still there , I also seen it again on 1-6-2012 but it was far out of range of my camera but I could make out the color of lights , on 1-2-2012 I also seen a redish orange ball of light fly over heading in the same genral drection at a high rates of speed with no sound ,it went from horizion to horizion in 3 to 5 sec
